resources.string:
• Use ScrollView to enable vertical scrolling for the list of concepts.

 • Place a single vertical layout (LinearLayout / ConstraintLayout) inside the ScrollView.

 • Add a list of Android concepts using TextView, Button, or CardView.

 • Make each concept clickable using an OnClickListener.

 • On click, launch a new Activity using an Intent.

 • Pass the concept name via Intent extras for dynamic content.

 • Open the new screen on top of the current screen.
